description: Frozen yoghurt pieces topped with mashed raspberries, muesli and coconut flakes makes a perfect after-school sweet treat. Plus, they're a nutritionally approved treat that the kids will love.
name: Healthier Frozen Fruity Yoghurt Bark With Muesli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line a 30 x 20cm baking tray with baking paper, allowing paper to overhang for handles. Using a fork, mash raspberries in a bowl until almost pureed.
Whisk yoghurt, vanilla and maple syrup in a large bowl until combined.
Spread yoghurt mixture over prepared tray. Smooth surface.
Drizzle with puree. Top with muesli and coconut flakes. Freeze for 3-4 hours or until firm. Cut into pieces and serve.
